description.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Education and schools in selected areas will have the capacity to improve the learning, completion and inclusion of children with disabilities., which contributes to Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children will have access to high-quality, relevant, inclusive integrated care services for early childhood and education services.

mailing-address.narrative: Avenida Anacaona No.9 Casa de Naciones Unidas 3er. piso Mirador Sur Santo Domingo

sector.narrative: System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - life skills (for personal empowerment, active citizenship, etc.)
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

title.narrative: Dominican Republic United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Dominican Republic Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Education)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Education and schools in selected areas will have the capacity to improve the learning, completion and inclusion of children with disabilities.

description.narrative: UNICEF strengthened the education system and promoted the quality of education, by: i) Taking the first steps in the improvement of the educational inclusion of children with disabilities, ii) Promoting the improvement of children's learning though the strengthening of the application of the new Pedagogical Model of teaching reading, writing and mathematics in the first years of primary school, with the design of a monitoring system of the application of this Model and implementing the monitoring system in an educational district, and iii) Expanding the National Strategy of Peace Culture through the training of 15,822 MoE officers. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of teachers (per year) who received training in the new model of mathematics and literacy teaching, with support from UNICEF
Number of schools (per year) that implement The National Culture of Peace Strategy (including prevention of Gender Based Violence)
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of curricula and support from teachers and school administrators that are inclusive of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
